tts.example: tts soosBot is a great bot!
tts.description: This command will generate a text to speech file from the text given.

fact.description: This command will give a random fact.

weather.description: This command will give the weather of the place provided.

joke.description: This command will give a random joke.

love.description: This command will prompt the user to give two names, and will calculate the % of love between them. \n(Info not 100% accurate)

ymjoke.description: This command will give a random yo momma joke.

quote.description: This command will give a random famous quote

covid.description: This command will give covid data for the country given.

flag.description: This command will give the flag, and other info about the place provided.

translate.description: This command will translate the given text into english.

translate-to.example: translate spanish Hello, how are you?
translate-to.description: This command will translate the given text into the given language.
